aboutData.title: Hi, it's me ... Bruno VANG ^^ ...
paragraphs: Passionate about programming and fascinated by the power of modern computers, I decided to retrain in this field.
Formerly a team leader in the logistics sector, I undertook training as an online video game programmer with the GAMING CAMPUS school in collaboration with GameCodeur.
This experience gave me a solid grounding in video game programming.

Eager to enrich my career and broaden my skills to meet a variety of demands, I then decided to train as a Web Integrator at the OpenClassRoom school, specializing in the visual and ergonomic aspects of websites.
Despite the challenges involved, and with no prior knowledge of programming, I persevered and graduated.
Today, strengthened by these experiences and motivated by my passion for programming, I'm ready to take on new challenges and actively contribute to the development of innovative projects.
